title: Pokemon Zeta 1.0.3 Beta (Mac) with Latest Patch
description:
Pokemon Zeta and Omicron are two Pokemon Fan-games created by reddit user "thesuzerain" using RPG Maker XP and Pokemon Essentials (by Maruno) and sprited by reddit user "Sir_Willis_CMS" using Photoshop.

It is unique in the aspect as being one of the very few Pokemon fan-games to have two games, following the Pokemon tradition, as well as having all 649 Pokemon.

It is currently in the Beta testing stage, with v1.0.0 of the Beta being released to the public on the 13th of September, 2013, the current version is v1.0.3.

[If you already have the game and would like to apply the patch yourself then you can download it from here:

Website: http://www.pokemonzetaomicron.com/
Reddit:
Wiki: http://pokemonzetaomicron.wikia.com/wiki/Pokemon_Zeta_Omicron_Wiki


Patch Notes (1.0.3)
-fixed the safari zone crash (again)
-fixed a glitch in zeta where you could not get to the end of the beta
-im fixing other bugs as we speak, the next patch will be bigger
-change in app icon & name

Patch Notes (1.0.2)
-fixed the safari zone crash
-fixed an error where a major plot point couldn't be read due to shifted text
-fixed a long walk to be a much shorter walk
-fixed the Thor battle
-also fixed a glitch i do not want to name, but if you've had it occur to you you know what i'm talking about

Patch Notes (1.0.1)
-You can walk inside the chalkboard of pokeschool.
-The ladder glitch and jeremy in the starter cave
-Lady at bottom right of wonder cave doesnt talk
-Wonder cave strength boulders don't work
-Invisible wall at the lower floor of Wonder Cave
-Professor disapperas with the starter fix
-No TM for brick break in the gym
-You can click the same flower 4x to make yourself appear
-Gym leader tells you the TMs they are one-time use
-route 303, bit of a grpahical error
-lose to rival on route, bad things happen
-Onega pokegear pickup
-Invisible if you lose during Devon fight
-Oak sprite disappears when he resets your follower
-When entering the safari zone, your money box is over most of the safari warden dialogue.
-Asgard grunts do not leave museum
-Maybe make it clearer that Jake is in the pokÃƒÂ©mon school, a lot of people seem to think he's in Superior. Even tho i have no idea how, it literally says "just south of my lab"
